body:
This PR supersedes #12959

### The goals:
- Add CHAI spack package.
- Reference this package as an optional dependency in RAJA.
- Update the previous PR and address the review comments.

### Notes:
- Umpire is only marginally impacted.
- I removed mentions of TBB and OpenMP backend. I haven’t tested this so I preferred not adding it.
- CHAI package was not thoroughly tested, but we need this package to introduce better CI on our side.

@rblake-llnl @davidbeckingsale @rhornung67

Closes #12959
title: Feature/raja chai umpire update
